attributes.action: Bring back the McDonalds Spicy Mayo Sauce
attributes.additional_details:
After once enjoying the Spicy Mayo sauce on a variety of different McDonald meals, since the withdrawal of this item I am forced to actually taste the McDonalds burgers, which we all know isn't very good.

If there is one way for Boris to get the country back on side, Spicy Mayo is the one.
attributes.background: We want you too cease all trading with McDonalds in the United Kingdom until such a time that they rightfully bring back the Spicy Mayo sauce.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what products to sell are a matter for individual hospitality venues, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
